metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0356 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw, similar to to CVE-2016-9646, exists in ikiwiki before 3.20170111, in the passwordauth plugin's use of CGI::FormBuilder, allowing an attacker to bypass authentication via repeated parameters.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-0356` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ikiwiki - 3.20180228-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ikiwiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20180228-1').
